channel.title: You're Dead, Fluff-butt!
channel.description:
Just putting out there something that makes me a bit irritable .
Had this discussion a few times in the graveyard with a dead blue dragon
Me : why didn't you give your class Them : I shouldn't have to , they had no proof Me : You're Dead Fluff-butt!
Me : why didn't you give your journal Them : I didn't want to give anything away Me : Me : You're dead, carrot face!
Me : why did you just say "whatever" and call people names Them : other random excuse for not offering a defense Me : You're dead, bunny bumpkin
Dead Dead dead dead dead

item.title: You're Dead, Fluff-butt!
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I am asking out of curiosity and sometimes annoyance . I talk to some people who are adamant they made the right descions not to reveal their class an logs even though they are dead .
you get the feeling they will do it the next time etc

I guess the reason I ask them is to try and think about why they got executed and if they should modify their game next time round

Read full topic

item.title: You're Dead, Fluff-butt!
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
I think he means when he was on the stand why didn’t they defend

Read full topic

item.title: You're Dead, Fluff-butt!
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
I think a bigger question is why you’re asking people to defend themselves from beyond the grave when it achieves nothing

Read full topic

item.title: You're Dead, Fluff-butt!
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
My favourite time for people to finally claim their role is just after eveyones already voted for execution .

“oh my god guys I was butler . you guys are idiots !”

item.title: You're Dead, Fluff-butt!
item.dc:creator: Ben_Pollard
item.description:
@orangeandblack5 the usual excuse “Well why would I out myself u might be unseen” because you’re about to get executed!

item.title: You're Dead, Fluff-butt!
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
Just putting out there something that makes me a bit irritable .

Had this discussion a few times in the graveyard with a dead blue dragon

Me : why didn’t you give your class
Them : I shouldn’t have to , they had no proof
Me : You’re Dead Fluff-butt!

Me : why didn’t you give your journal
Them : I didn’t want to give anything away
Me : Me : You’re dead, carrot face!

Me : why did you just say “whatever” and call people names
Them : other random excuse for not offering a defense
Me : You’re dead, bunny bumpkin

Dead Dead dead dead dead
